valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 25 Sep 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 995 moving steadily northeast, expected 350 miles west of Bailey 967 by midnight tonight. High southern Norway 1036 dissipating
